ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] LDoN Lowest Member MIssion
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool! I ve found that the easiest missions to do are outright slaughter missions. You have to kill x number of mobs. Usually we churn through them pretty fast.
ygData.messageBody:
Cool! I've found that the easiest missions to do are outright slaughter
missions. You have to kill x number of mobs. Usually we churn through them
pretty fast. It's pretty fun.
You generally need someone for crowd control. I was grouped with an
excellent bard who handled crowd control, haste, cure disease/poison, mana
regen, tracking, and being main looter. We finished with about 20 minutes
to spare and went on to kill the named. Got 22 points for that one
adventure.
luv,
-Su


> The suggestion worked well. I was playing my 29 alt
> barbarian warrior and was the lowest of the party (35
> Human Ranger, 34 Dwarf Paladin, 33 Froglok Cleric, 35
> Woodelf Druid, 32 Iskar Monk). I got the mission and
> we churned thru it, got to the target and killed him
> with very few problems.
>
> Estro Runeweaver
> 46 Halfling Druid
>
> Oltheros Baneslayer
> 29 Barbarian Warrior
>
